price: 彼らの言うようなことから（無縁な）、あなたの主*、権勢の主*に称え*あれ。
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلۡعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbika rabbi al-ʿizati ʿammā yaṣifūna
